alert.note: Alert for DeKalb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 2:55PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Intrenchment Creek near Intrenchment Creek at Constitution Rd near Atlanta affecting DeKalb County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is expected. * WHERE...Intrenchment Creek near Intrenchment Creek at Constitution Rd near Atlanta. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in the woodlands and natural flood plain of the creek upstream and downstream from the gage at Constitution Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:52 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 9.6 feet and rising. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
